pkgmetadata.longdescription: Core 'hubverse' Utilities // Core set of low-level utilities common across the 'hubverse'. Used to interact with 'hubverse' schema, Hub configuration files and model outputs and designed to be primarily used internally by other 'hubverse' packages. See Reich et al. (2022) doi:10.2105/AJPH.2022.306831 for an overview of Collaborative Hubs.
